apple_vendor_description: This tender kiss emoji on Apple devices showcases two men, one with a medium skin tone and the other with no visible skin tone, sharing an intimate moment with Apple's hallmark soft rounded edges and subtle 3D modeling. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting on their faces convey a sense of gentle affection and emotional depth, characteristic of Apple's inclusive emoji designs. It's a heartfelt way to express love, romance, or a deep bond between two men in digital correspondence on Apple devices.
